description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Uproar! is a side-scrolling beat-em up, switching from the traditional 2d graphics, to modern polygonal graphics, adding depth and realism. The player takes control of a man trying to restore order during a chaotic city-wide riot. Facing off against gangs and armed thugs, the player must restore order in the only way they understand, with a good beatdown!
description.short: Uproar! is a side-scrolling beat-em up, switching from the traditional 2d graphics, to modern polygonal graphics, adding depth and realism. Facing off against gangs and armed thugs, the player must restore order in the only way they understand, with a good beatdown!
